definition: thin piece/flake/a slice/film/TV play/to slice/to carve thin/partial/incomplete/one-sided/classifier for slices, tablets, tract of land, area of water/classifier for CDs, movies, DVDs etc/used with numeral 一[yi1]: classifier for scenario, scene, feeling, atmosphere, sound etc/Kangxi radical 91

sentences.english: I have a bowl of cereal every morning.
sentences.chinese: 我每天早晨吃一碗麦片粥。

sentences.english: Add the cereal and cranberries. Stir. Set aside.
sentences.chinese: 加入麦片和蔓越莓一起搅拌。

sentences.english: Egg keep you feeling full much longer than cereal or toast.
sentences.chinese: 鸡蛋比麦片或面包让你觉得更耐饥。

sentences.english: Oatmeal is another great staple for breakfast.
sentences.chinese: 燕麦片也是早餐必备食品。

sentences.english: He's more concerned about spilled cereal than having a brain-damaged child.
sentences.chinese: 看来比起有个脑瘫的孩子来说，丫更在意丫的麦片。

sentences.english: Stir them into cereal and yogurt
Unschoolers are hippies, eat granola and sprouts, and wear sandals.
sentences.chinese: 非学校教育者是嬉皮士，吃麦片和新鲜蔬菜，穿拖鞋。

sentences.english: Eating it with a bowl of oatmeal can leave you feeling full and satisfied until lunch time.
sentences.chinese: 用它来泡麦片吃可以让你直到午饭时间都不觉得饿。

sentences.english: Then, deliberately, he pours maple syrup into his oatmeal.
sentences.chinese: 然后，他又刻意往燕麦片粥里倒进枫糖浆。

sentences.english: I add fresh milk to the oats and take them hot.
sentences.chinese: 我在燕麦片上加鲜奶，煮热了吃。

sentences.english: First she tasted the porridge of the Great Big Bear, and that was too hot for her.
sentences.chinese: 她先尝了尝大大熊的麦片粥，发现对她来说太热了。

sentences.english: Most store-bought brands are filled with sugar and fat.
sentences.chinese: 多数店铺卖的麦片品牌都有大量的糖和脂肪。

sentences.english: Layer fresh or frozen berries with vanilla yogurt and nuts or granola.
sentences.chinese: 新鲜或冷冻浆果与香草酸奶和坚果或麦片。

sentences.english: Add the cereal and cranberries. Stir.
sentences.chinese: 加入麦片和蔓越莓一起搅拌。

sentences.english: I churned up the cornmeal porridge with milk and sugar.
sentences.chinese: 之后，煮了加糖和牛奶的麦片粥。
